div.p: SANDOMIR, a city, the capital of a palatinate of the fame name, in Little Poland, on the Villula. The Swedes blew up the caſtle in 1656; and here, in was a dreadful battle between the Tartars and Ruffians. It is 84 miles ſouth-eaſt of Cracow. Lat. 49. 26. Long. 20. 10.
